comments.text:
But fact about coffee that it's a stimulant.. If you drink about 1-2 cups 
everyday chances are you won't be able to function properly if you don't 
drink 1-2 cups. And in time 1-2 cups won't be enough. You crave for more 
until you drink about 5-6 cups a day... I experienced.. Now I only drink 
coffee about 3-4 times a week. So that I can function normally without 
relying on coffee﻿

Ok 
1.dip the tea bag ten times up and down
2.stir with a silver or gold spoon (these meatles are tasteless and others 
some times leve your tea tasting of iron or somethin)
3.NEVER EVER wash your kettel /tea pot with soap or cleaning products (even 
kettle cleaner) as this will make the tea tatse horrible for about a month
4.let your tea brew long enought , dont rush it

I hope you liked these tips
